# Note: Input files are generated by makePLSDA.py
# Then you must tranpose the .original.csv file by running makeTranpose.csv
# Cannot use the CSVTranspose plugin, that expects headers
# Future: Integrate flexibility there

# Output will be in a single PDF file with all four plots (Rplots.pdf)

Plugin CSVMerge inputfile merge.tossed.txt outputfile Smoking.abund.all.norm.tossed.csv
Plugin CSV2PLSDA inputfile ../../../Parameters/parameters.csv2plsda.txt outputfile .
Plugin PLSDA inputfile ../../../Parameters/parameters.plsda.txt outputfile plsda
